meanings.definition: (ポルトガル語)懐疑的に、疑い深く

examples.sentence: Ele olhou para a proposta ceticamente.
examples.translation: He looked at the proposal skeptically.
examples.english_translation: He looked at the proposal skeptically.

etymology.value: Derivado de 'cético' (skeptic) com o sufixo '-mente' (equivalent to '-ly' in English).
